text: Folco Quilici (9 April 1930 - 24 February 2018) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter. He directed a total of 22 movies between 1952 until his retirement in 2005. He was known for directing The Last Paradise, The Wind Blows Free, and The Sixth Continent. He also wrote the script for Dagli Appennini alle Ande. He was born in Ferrara, Italy. Quilici died in Orvieto, Italy of a stroke on 24 February 2018 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters
title: Folco Quilici
